channel.title: .357 Magnum doesn't reload while aiming
channel.description:
Not sure if this was intentional or not, but the magnum doesn't automatically reload when you empty the chamber during the right-click aim.
Sorry if this was a repost, but I couldn't find a search feature here.

item.title: .357 Magnum doesn't reload while aiming
item.dc:creator: vktech
item.description:
I think that’s intentional, but thanks for the feedback!

Read full topic
